body_html:
Hi @AntoinePrv, I would like to implement sparse ops that can support the Graph neural network model you are using. Can I get a pointer to the model? It will be super helpful if you also point me to places in the model that needs sparse ops.

I actually switch my work to the great Pytorch Geometric, all the sparse dependencies are in the related Pytorch Sparse (with C++/CUDA extensions).

I will try to mention this issue to the developer. Surley his feedback is valuable.
body_text:
Hi @AntoinePrv, I would like to implement sparse ops that can support the Graph neural network model you are using. Can I get a pointer to the model? It will be super helpful if you also point me to places in the model that needs sparse ops.

I actually switch my work to the great Pytorch Geometric, all the sparse dependencies are in the related Pytorch Sparse (with C++/CUDA extensions).
I will try to mention this issue to the developer. Surley his feedback is valuable.
body:
> Hi @AntoinePrv, I would like to implement sparse ops that can support the Graph neural network model you are using. Can I get a pointer to the model? It will be super helpful if you also point me to places in the model that needs sparse ops.

I actually switch my work to the great [Pytorch Geometric](https://github.com/rusty1s/pytorch_geometric), all the sparse dependencies are in the related [Pytorch Sparse](https://github.com/rusty1s/pytorch_sparse) (with C++/CUDA extensions).

I will try to mention this issue to the developer. Surley his feedback is valuable.
